Title: French Pocket Watch Domina Geneva Enamel Dial Gold Plated Case 1950
Description: French Pocket Watch Domina Geneva Enamel Dial Gold Plated Case 1950 DOMINA mechanical french pocket watch, Domina previously Fernand PIERRE, WETZEL & Cie Morteau. The movement measure 1 5/8" (41 mm) diameter and works well. Case No. 455161 and marked PBMM Geneva in rolled gold plated metal, Overall this pocket watch measures 2 1/4" (56 mm) diameter. The enamel of the frame is clean, in nice used condition, with slight wear on the case as presented by the folowing pictures.
